content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37.0, y=-85.0)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (39.0,-85.0), and (37.0,-85.0)
- Wooden chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5), and (36.5,-86.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5) and (35.5,-85.5)
All drills are actively mining coal and storing in respective chests

### Copper/Iron Mining Station at position(x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
Mining setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining copper and iron ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) for ore collection
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Transport belt system starting at (-29.5,-60.5)

### Iron Processing Line at position(x=-10.0, y=-59.0)
Large iron processing setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Multiple burner inserters for automation

### Smelting Array at position(x=0.0, y=0.0)
Large smelting setup consisting of:
- 6 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Multiple burner inserters and wooden chests for automation
- Transport belt system for item movement
- Output collection chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)

### Power Generation Complex at position(x=-3.5, y=27.5)
Complete power setup:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric pole network with poles at (7.5,20.5), (11.5,20.5), (7.5,13.5), (10.5,12.5)

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert items without having them in inventory
- Check inventory contents before attempting to insert items
- Ensure required items (like coal) are collected before trying to use them

### Errors when trying to extract from full containers
- Monitor chest capacities and empty them regularly
- Set up better automation to prevent containers from getting full
- Implement a more efficient item extraction system when chests reach capacity

### Errors when trying to extract more items than available
- Verify item quantities before attempting large extractions
- Implement checks for available quantities before extraction attempts
